verses.verse: הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold עַבְדִּי֙ <WH5650> Behold my servant אֶתְמָךְ־ <WH8551> whom I uphold בּ֔וֹ בְּחִירִ֖י <WH972> mine elect רָצְתָ֣ה <WH7521> delighteth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> [in whom] my soul נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> I have put רוּחִי֙ <WH7307> my spirit עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> judgment לַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> to the Gentiles יוֹצִֽיא׃ <WH3318> upon him he shall bring forth

לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יִצְעַ֖ק <WH6817> He shall not cry וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> nor lift up וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <WH8085> to be heard בַּח֖וּץ <WH2351> in the street קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> nor cause his voice

קָנֶ֤ה <WH7070> reed רָצוּץ֙ <WH7533> A bruised לֹ֣א <WH3808> He will not יִשְׁבּ֔וֹר <WH7665> shall he not break וּפִשְׁתָּ֥ה <WH6594> flax כֵהָ֖ה <WH3544> and the smoking לֹ֣א <WH3808> He will not יְכַבֶּ֑נָּה <WH3518> shall he not quench לֶאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> unto truth יוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> he shall bring forth מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִכְהֶה֙ <WH3543> He shall not fail וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יָר֔וּץ <WH7533> nor be discouraged עַד־ <WH5704> Until יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> till he have set בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the earth מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment וּלְתוֹרָת֖וֹ <WH8451> for his law אִיִּ֥ים <WH339> and the isles יְיַחֵֽילוּ׃ <WH3176> shall wait פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith הָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH410> God יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בּוֹרֵ֤א <WH1254> he that created הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heavens וְנ֣וֹטֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5186> and stretched them out רֹקַ֥ע <WH7554> he that spread forth הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְצֶאֱצָאֶ֑יהָ <WH6631> and that which cometh out נֹתֵ֤ן <WH5414> of it he that giveth נְשָׁמָה֙ <WH5397> breath לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto the people עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> on וְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> upon it and spirit לַהֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> to them that walk בָּֽהּ׃

אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> I the LORD קְרָאתִ֥יךָֽ <WH7121> have called בְצֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> thee in righteousness וְאַחְזֵ֣ק <WH2388> and will hold בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <WH5341> and will keep וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֛ <WH5414> thee and give לִבְרִ֥ית <WH1285> thee for a covenant עָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people לְא֥וֹר <WH216> for a light גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the Gentiles

לִפְקֹ֖חַ <WH6491> To open עֵינַ֣יִם <WH5869> eyes עִוְר֑וֹת <WH5787> the blind לְהוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> to bring out מִמַּסְגֵּר֙ <WH4525> from the prison אַסִּ֔יר <WH616> the prisoners מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house כֶּ֖לֶא <WH3608> out of the prison יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> [and] them that sit חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> in darkness

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> that שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> that [is] my name וּכְבוֹדִי֙ <WH3519> and my glory לְאַחֵ֣ר <WH312> to another לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor אֶתֵּ֔ן <WH5414> will I not give וּתְהִלָּתִ֖י <WH8416> neither my praise לַפְּסִילִֽים׃ <WH6456> to graven images

הָרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <WH7223> Behold the former things הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold בָ֑אוּ <WH935> are come to pass וַֽחֲדָשׁוֹת֙ <WH2319> and new things אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I מַגִּ֔יד <WH5046> do I declare בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> Before תִּצְמַ֖חְנָה <WH6779> before they spring forth אַשְׁמִ֥יע <WH8085> I tell אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> פ

שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> a new תְּהִלָּת֖וֹ <WH8416> [and] his praise מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> from the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יוֹרְדֵ֤י <WH3381> ye that go down הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> to the sea וּמְלֹא֔וֹ <WH4393> and all that is therein אִיִּ֖ים <WH339> the isles וְיֹשְׁבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3427> and the inhabitants

יִשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> thereof lift up מִדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> Let the wilderness וְעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> and the cities חֲצֵרִ֖ים <WH2691> [their voice] the villages תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> doth inhabit קֵדָ֑ר <WH6938> [that] Kedar יָרֹ֙נּוּ֙ <WH7442> sing יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> let the inhabitants סֶ֔לַע <WH5554> rock מֵרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> from the top הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> of the mountains יִצְוָֽחוּ׃ <WH6681> let them shout
יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> Let them give לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> glory וּתְהִלָּת֖וֹ <WH8416> his praise בָּאִיִּ֥ים <WH339> in the islands יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <WH5046> and declare

יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD כַּגִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> as a mighty man יֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> shall go forth כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> like a man מִלְחָמ֖וֹת <WH4421> of war יָעִ֣יר <WH5782> he shall stir up קִנְאָ֑ה <WH7068> jealousy יָרִ֙יעַ֙ <WH7321> he shall cry אַף־ <WH637> yes יַצְרִ֔יחַ <WH6873> yea roar עַל־ <WH5921> against אֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> against his enemies יִתְגַּבָּֽר׃ <WH1396> he shall prevail ס

הֶחֱשֵׁ֙יתִי֙ <WH2814> holden my peace מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> I have long time אַחֲרִ֖ישׁ <WH2790> I have been still אֶתְאַפָּ֑ק <WH662> [and] refrained כַּיּוֹלֵדָ֣ה <WH3205> like a travailing woman אֶפְעֶ֔ה <WH6463> myself [now] will I cry אֶשֹּׁ֥ם <WH5395> gasp וְאֶשְׁאַ֖ף <WH7602> and devour יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> at once

אַחֲרִ֤יב <WH2717> I will make waste הָרִים֙ <WH2022> mountains וּגְבָע֔וֹת <WH1389> and hills וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֶשְׂבָּ֖ם <WH6212> all their herbs אוֹבִ֑ישׁ <WH3001> and dry up וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> and I will make נְהָרוֹת֙ <WH5104> the rivers לָֽאִיִּ֔ים <WH339> islands וַאֲגַמִּ֖ים <WH98> the pools אוֹבִֽישׁ׃ <WH3001> and I will dry up

וְהוֹלַכְתִּ֣י <WH1980> will lead עִוְרִ֗ים <WH5787> the blind בְּדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> by a way לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> [that] they knew בִּנְתִיב֥וֹת <WH5410> them in paths לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> [that] they have not known אַדְרִיכֵ֑ם <WH1869> not I will lead אָשִׂים֩ <WH7760> I will make מַחְשָׁ֨ךְ <WH4285> darkness לִפְנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH6440> before לָא֗וֹר <WH216> light וּמַֽעֲקַשִּׁים֙ <WH4625> them and crooked things לְמִישׁ֔וֹר <WH4334> straight אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> These things עֲשִׂיתִ֖ם <WH6213> will I do וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and I will not עֲזַבְתִּֽים׃ <WH5800> unto them and not forsake

נָסֹ֤גוּ <WH5472> They shall be turned אָחוֹר֙ <WH268> back יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> ashamed בֹ֔שֶׁת <WH1322> they shall be greatly הַבֹּטְחִ֖ים <WH982> that trust בַּפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> in graven images הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <WH559> that say לְמַסֵּכָ֖ה <WH4541> to the molten images אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> You אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> Ye [are] our gods ס
הַחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <WH2795> ye deaf שְׁמָ֑עוּ <WH8085> Hear וְהַעִוְרִ֖ים <WH5787> ye blind הַבִּ֥יטוּ <WH5027> and look לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> that ye may see

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who עִוֵּר֙ <WH5787> Who [is] blind כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant וְחֵרֵ֖שׁ <WH2795> deaf כְּמַלְאָכִ֣י <WH4397> as my messenger אֶשְׁלָ֑ח <WH7971> [that] I sent מִ֤י <WH4310> Who עִוֵּר֙ <WH5787> ? who [is] blind כִּמְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <WH7999> as [he that is] perfect וְעִוֵּ֖ר <WH5787> and blind כְּעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> as the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD'S

[רָאִיתָ כ] (רָאֹ֥ות <WH7200> advise self ק) רַבּ֖וֹת <WH7227> many things וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> none תִשְׁמֹ֑ר <WH8104> but thou observest פָּק֥וֹחַ <WH6491> not opening אָזְנַ֖יִם <WH241> the ears וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> none יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> but he heareth

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD חָפֵ֖ץ <WH2654> is well pleased לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake צִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> for his righteousness' יַגְדִּ֥יל <WH1431> sake he will magnify תּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> the law וְיַאְדִּֽיר׃ <WH142> and make [it] honourable

וְהוּא֮ <WH1931> this עַם־ <WH5971> But this [is] a people בָּז֣וּז <WH962> robbed וְשָׁסוּי֒ <WH8154> and spoiled הָפֵ֤חַ <WH6351> [they are] all of them snared בַּֽחוּרִים֙ <WH2352> caves כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> All וּבְבָתֵּ֥י <WH1004> houses כְלָאִ֖ים <WH3608> in prison הָחְבָּ֑אוּ <WH2244> and they are hid הָי֤וּ <WH1961> have become לָבַז֙ <WH957> they are for a prey וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> none מַצִּ֔יל <WH5337> and none delivereth מְשִׁסָּ֖ה <WH4933> for a spoil וְאֵין־ <WH369> none אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> and none saith הָשַֽׁב׃ <WH7725> Restore
מִ֥י <WH4310> Who בָכֶ֖ם יַאֲזִ֣ין <WH238> Who among you will give ear זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise יַקְשִׁ֥ב <WH7181> to this? [who] will hearken וְיִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and hear לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> after

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> Who gave [לִמְשֹׁוסֶה כ] (לִמְשִׁסָּ֧ה <WH4882> spoil ק) יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and Israel לְבֹזְזִ֖ים <WH962> to the robbers הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God ז֚וּ <WH2098> he against whom חָטָ֣אנוּ <WH2398> we have sinned ל֔וֹ וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not אָב֤וּ <WH14> ? for they would בִדְרָכָיו֙ <WH1870> in his ways הָל֔וֹךְ <WH1980> not walk וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> were they שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> neither were they obedient בְּתוֹרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8451> unto his law

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <WH8210> Therefore he hath poured עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> on חֵמָ֣ה <WH2534> upon him the fury אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> of his anger וֶעֱז֖וּז <WH5807> and the strength מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of battle וַתְּלַהֲטֵ֤הוּ <WH3857> and it hath set him on fire מִסָּבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָדָ֔ע <WH3045> yet he knew וַתִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> not and it burned בּ֖וֹ וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> him yet he laid עַל־ <WH5921> not לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> [it] not to heart פ
